pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Constrained Clusterwise Regression // A collection of functions for estimating spatial regimes, aggregations of neighboring spatial units that are homogeneous in functional terms. The term spatial regime, therefore, should not be understood as a synonym for cluster. More precisely, the term cluster does not presuppose any functional relationship between the variables considered, while the term regime is linked to a regressive relationship underlying the spatial process. For more information, please see Postiglione, P., Andreano, M.S., Benedetti R. (2013) doi:10.1007/s10614-012-9325-z , Andreano, M.S., Benedetti, R., and Postiglione, P. (2017) doi:10.1007/s11135-016-0415-1 , Bille', A.G., Benedetti, R., and Postiglione, P. (2017) doi:10.1080/17421772.2017.1286373.
